messages.text:
Hello ukai, golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review the following change.

tsavola: please complete a CLA as described at
http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright

Thanks

On 2010/01/15 22:06:04, rsc wrote:
> tsavola: please complete a CLA as described at
> http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright

are you also timo.savola@iki.fi?

rsc@golang.org wrote:
> On 2010/01/15 22:06:04, rsc wrote:
>> tsavola: please complete a CLA as described at
>> http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright
> 
> are you also timo.savola@iki.fi?

Yeah.  But Code Review insists using @gmail.com even though I've 
configured my Gmail identity to be @iki.fi.  I can't seem to find a way 
to convince Google Accounts about my real primary address.

timo

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=08813daed3ef ***
